description: CachedSupplier now caches exceptions briefly when there is no non-stale value and the StaleValueBehavior is STRICT. This impacts ContainerCredentialsProvider, InstanceProfileCredentialsProvider, ProcessCredentialsProvider, CachedTokenRefresher, DefaultEc2MetadataClient, ProfileFileRefresher, CachedS3ExpressCredentials, SsoCredentialsProvider, and StsCredentialsProvider.
